events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
The system identified this case as a refund request due to customer reporting receipt of incorrect item.
Assigning this refund request to the customer support agent team for further action and resolution.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the problem with your order. I’ll help you process the refund right away.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number to verify the refund request?
Here is the photo of the package and the item as well as the order confirmation number you asked for.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3 business days.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick refund. I will consider ordering again from your store.
The refund was successfully processed and confirmation was sent to the customer’s email address.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Closing this case as the refund has been confirmed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution provided.
An invitation to complete a satisfaction survey regarding the refund process was sent to the customer.
